title: Automate LinkedIn Outreach with Notion and OpenAI
author: Paul Mikulskis

A Notion _"database"_ is just a table on a Notion Page.
This table will have various rows, for which a minimum of three columns are required:
- Name
- Status
- Date

The Date column is the most important, which will dictate when that row from your Notion table containing the text should be posted.

readme:
This template is based on the [following template](https://n8n.io/workflows/2273-automated-workflow-for-daily-linkedin-posts-using-notion/). Thank you for the groundwork, Matheus.

## How it works:

  1. Store your snippets of text in a Notion table. Each snippet should have an image associated with it (copy + pasted into the text)
  2. Connect to your table via a Notion _"integration"_ , from which N8N can then query your pre-meditated posts
  3. The text is fed through an OpenAI assistant to boost engagement via formatting
  4. The re-formatted text along with the image pulled from the Notion snippet are combined into a post for your LinkedIn
  5. The row in the original Notion table from step 1 containing this post is set to a status of _"Done"_



## Set up steps:

  * You will need to create a Notion _"integration"_ , which will yield a _"secret key"_ which you enter into your N8N as a _"Credential"_.
  * You will need to create a LinkedIn _"app"_ in order to post on your behalf. When creating your LinkedIn _"app"_ , you will be required to link this _"app"_ to a company page on LinkedIn. If you are doing this for yourself, seach for the _"Default Company Payge (for API testing)"_ , and select this page as it is provided by LinkedIn for individuals. You can find your LinkedIn apps here, and if you get stuck, further instructions on setting up this workflow (including this LinkedIn OAuth piece) can be found in this [YouTube Video Aide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOgmv6E9PAM) to these instructions.
  * Lastly, you will need to create an OpenAI API key, found on your [OpenAI Playground Dashboard](https://platform.openai.com/playground/chat). Once you created an API key, make sure you have an assistant created from the _"Assistants"_ tab on the OpenAI dashboard. This assistant and its instructions will be needed for carrying out the re-formatting of your post.
readme_html:
This template is based on the following template. Thank you for the groundwork, Matheus.

How it works:

  1. Store your snippets of text in a Notion table. Each snippet should have an image associated with it (copy + pasted into the text)
  2. Connect to your table via a Notion "integration", from which N8N can then query your pre-meditated posts
  3. The text is fed through an OpenAI assistant to boost engagement via formatting
  4. The re-formatted text along with the image pulled from the Notion snippet are combined into a post for your LinkedIn
  5. The row in the original Notion table from step 1 containing this post is set to a status of "Done"

Set up steps:

  • You will need to create a Notion "integration", which will yield a "secret key" which you enter into your N8N as a "Credential".
  • You will need to create a LinkedIn "app" in order to post on your behalf. When creating your LinkedIn "app", you will be required to link this "app" to a company page on LinkedIn. If you are doing this for yourself, seach for the "Default Company Payge (for API testing)", and select this page as it is provided by LinkedIn for individuals. You can find your LinkedIn apps here, and if you get stuck, further instructions on setting up this workflow (including this LinkedIn OAuth piece) can be found in this YouTube Video Aide to these instructions.
  • Lastly, you will need to create an OpenAI API key, found on your OpenAI Playground Dashboard. Once you created an API key, make sure you have an assistant created from the "Assistants" tab on the OpenAI dashboard. This assistant and its instructions will be needed for carrying out the re-formatting of your post.
readme_zh:
该模板基于[以下模板](https://n8n.io/workflows/2273-automated-workflow-for-daily-linkedin-posts-using-notion/)构建。感谢Matheus打下的基础。

## 工作原理：

1. 将文字片段存储于Notion表格中，每个片段需附带图片（直接复制粘贴至文本）
2. 通过Notion「集成」连接表格，N8N即可查询预设的帖子内容
3. 文本经由OpenAI助手优化排版以提升互动性
4. 优化后的文本与Notion片段中的图片组合成LinkedIn帖子
5. 原始Notion表格中该帖子所在行的状态将被标记为「已完成」

## 配置步骤：

* 需创建Notion「集成」获取「密钥」，并在N8N中作为「凭证」录入
* 需创建LinkedIn「应用」实现代发功能。创建时需将应用关联至LinkedIn公司主页（个人用户请搜索选择LinkedIn提供的「Default Company Page (for API testing)」测试页面）。应用管理入口见[此链接](https://www.linkedin.com/developers/apps)，具体配置流程（含OAuth认证）可参考[YouTube视频教程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOgmv6E9PAM)
* 最后需在[OpenAI Playground控制台](https://platform.openai.com/playground/chat)创建API密钥，并在「Assistants」标签页创建助手。该助手及其指令将用于帖子内容优化重组

Notion的“数据库”实际上就是Notion页面上的一个表格。  
这个表格包含多行数据，至少需要以下三列：  
- 名称（Name）  
- 状态（Status）  
- 日期（Date）  

其中日期列最为关键，它决定了表格中该行文本内容的发布时间。
